Class JAttributeSlider

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JSlider
                  org.jhotdraw.draw.gui.JAttributeSlider
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants, AttributeEditor<java.lang.Double>
public class JAttributeSlider
extends javax.swing.JSlider
implements AttributeEditor<java.lang.Double>

A JSlider that can be used to edit a double attribute of a Figure.

Version:
$Id: JAttributeSlider.java 722 2010-11-26 08:49:25Z rawcoder $

Werner Randelshofer
